sorular.soru: In what situations are you allowed to overtake on the right hand side?
cevaplar: If someone is driving on the left unnecessarily.
Just before and on a roundabout.
If you are driving on the right hand side of the block marking.
If you want to overtake a tram.
If someone in front of you is indicating to turn right.
dogruCevap: Just before and on a roundabout.
If you are driving on the right hand side of the block marking.
If you want to overtake a tram.

feedback.metin: Overtaking on the right hand side is allowed in case of a traffic jam, when overtaking a tram, while driving on the right hand side of block marking, just before and on a roundabout, and when someone is pre-sorting and indicating to turn left. It is not allowed to overtake on the right hand side when someone is driving on the left unnecessarily. It is also not allowed when someone is indicating to turn right.

sorular.soru: What should you take into account when your vehicle is going to be towed?
cevaplar: That the steering lock can be activated.
That the cable should not be continuously taut.
That it is wise to turn on the hazard lights.
That an electric vehicle cannot be towed.
That the power steering and power brakes often do not work.
dogruCevap: That the steering lock can be activated.
That it is wise to turn on the hazard lights.
That an electric vehicle cannot be towed.
That the power steering and power brakes often do not work.

feedback.metin: If your vehicle is being towed, you should take into account that the steering lock can be activated. To prevent that, always turn your key in the ignition position. When the engine is off, the power brakes and power steering usually do not work. Do you have an electric vehicle? Then it is usually not allowed to be towed at all. Also remember that it is wise to switch on the hazard lights and that the cable between your vehicle and the towing vehicle should be taut as much as possible.
